mapper.select: SELECT u.id as id, u.nickname as nickname, COALESCE(r.total_score, 0) as totalScore FROM user u LEFT JOIN multiplayer_rank r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE u.id IN #{id} ORDER BY r.total_score DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO multiplayer_rank (user_id, total_score, player_rank, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalScore}, #{playerRank}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_score = VALUES(total_score), player_rank = VALUES(player_rank), updated_at = NOW()
mapper.update: update multiplayer_rank mr join( select user_id, dense_rank() over (order by total_score desc,updated_at asc)as calculated_rank from multiplayer_rank )rp on mr.user_id=rp.user_id set mr.player_rank=rp.calculated_rank, mr.updated_at=now()
